changeSet.author: Jon.Lent
changeSet.createProcedure: CREATE PROCEDURE DataValidation.GetDataValidationTicket @AccountNumber int, @FacilityId int, @MedicalRecordNumber int, @TicketTypeId int AS BEGIN SELECT DataValidation.Tickets.FacilityId, DataValidation.Tickets.Id as TicketId, DataValidation.Tickets.ResultsAreAvailable, DataValidation.Tickets.InitiatedOnDate, DataValidation.Tickets.TicketTypeId, DataValidation.Tickets.AccountNumber, DataValidation.Tickets.MedicalRecordNumber, DataValidation.Tickets.Viewed, DataValidation.Tickets.FusNoteSent, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.ResponseParseStrategy, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.CoverageOrderId, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.PlanCategoryId, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.InsurancePlanCode, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.ResponseGroupNumber, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.ResponseInsuredDob, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.ResponsePayor, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.ResponseStatus, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.ResponseSubscriberId, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.RequestInsuredFirstName, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.RequestInsuredLastName, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.RequestInsuredMiddleInit, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.RequestInsuredDob, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.RequestPayor, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.RequestSubscriberId, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.ResponseInsuredFirstName, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.ResponseInsuredLastName, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.ResponseInsuredMiddleInit, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.ResponseAuthCo, DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.ResponseAuthCoPhone FROM DataValidation.Tickets LEFT OUTER JOIN DataValidation.BenefitsResponses ON DataValidation.Tickets.Id = DataValidation.BenefitsResponses.TicketId WHERE DataValidation.Tickets.FacilityId = @FacilityId AND DataValidation.Tickets.AccountNumber = @AccountNumber AND DataValidation.Tickets.MedicalRecordNumber = @MedicalRecordNumber AND DataValidation.Tickets.TicketTypeId = @TicketTypeId AND DataValidation.Tickets.InitiatedOnDate = ( SELECT MAX( DataValidation.Tickets.InitiatedOnDate ) AS expr FROM DataValidation.Tickets WHERE DataValidation.Tickets.FacilityId = @FacilityId AND DataValidation.Tickets.AccountNumber = @AccountNumber AND DataValidation.Tickets.MedicalRecordNumber = @MedicalRecordNumber AND DataValidation.Tickets.TicketTypeId = @TicketTypeId ) END;
changeSet.sql: GRANT EXECUTE ON DataValidation.GetDataValidationTicket TO db_apionly;
changeSet.rollback: REVOKE EXECUTE ON DataValidation.GetDataValidationTicket FROM db_apionly; DROP PROCEDURE DataValidation.GetDataValidationTicket;
